text: Psi (Ѱ, ѱ) is a letter in the Cyrillic alphabet. It is used in Church Slavonic. It is based on the Greek letter Psi (letter). It was used to write Greek words.Simovyč, V. and J.B. Rudnycky, “The History of Ukrainian Orthography”, in Kubijovyč, Volodymyr ed. (1963), Ukraine: A Concise Encyclopædia, v 1. == References ==
title: Psi (Cyrillic)
